# AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
## `cdc2a8d2ecd748eef41e8d36a3750534`
`Mr. REED â€” 4 September 2007`

---


Mr. REED. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee 
on Foreign Relations be authorized to meet during the session of the 
Senate on Tuesday, September 4, 2007, at 2 p.m., in room 419 of the 
Dirksen Senate Office Building, to hear testimony from the Government 
Accountability Office on the situation in Iraq.
